content.webTitle: Why do gyms play such loud music?

fields.headline: Why do gyms play such loud music?
fields.bodyText: Why do gyms play music so loudly? It’s like being in a nightclub. Even when wearing headphones to listen to one’s own music, it is impossible to block their music out. Pete Dorey, Bath Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
